title: New User Offer: Get Up to Rs. 500 Off
description: Users need to signup to avail this offer. The users can get Rs. 500 in Ajio wallet. This offer is valid to new users only. This is 100% redeemable.

title: Minimum 50% Off on Bedsheets & Blankets
description: Snuggle up with minimum 50% off on bedsheets and blankets—enjoy comfort without compromising your budget. Elevate your sleep sanctuary with premium bedding essentials, all at an unbeatable discount. Act fast to enjoy the luxury of quality linens at exclusive price. Grab yours now!

title: Get Up to 80% Off on Premium Accessories
description: Enjoy up to 80% off on premium accessories that redefine your fashion game. Upgrade your look effortlessly with high-quality, stylish pieces. Choose from bag, sunglasse, wallet, watch, belt etc. Grab yours now!

title: Flat Rs.75 Cashback on Using Mobikwik For New Users
description: Flat Rs. 75 Mobikwik Cashback on first-time payment using Mobikwik wallet, minimum transaction Rs. 999. Available for both new and existing users. Limited-time offer.

title: Men's Sweatshirts & Hoodies Online Up to 80% Off
description: Enjoy up to 80% off on Men's sweatshirts and hoodies. Prices start at just Rs. 245. Available for both new and existing users. Hurry, offer valid for a limited time.

title: Boys T-Shirts Under Rs.399
description: Boys T-Shirts online under Rs.399. Prices starting at Rs.60. Available for all new and existing users. Limited-time offer.

title: Buy Women's Shawls & Wraps Up to 70% Off
description: Shop women's shawls and wraps online for up to a 70% discount. Prices start at just Rs.72. This offer is available to both new and existing users. Hurry, as the promotion is valid for a limited time.

title: Buy Stocks & Stockings For Women Up to 35% Off
description: Purchase stocks and stockings online at a discount of up to 35%. Prices start at Rs.69. Available for both new and existing users. Offer valid for a limited time.

title: Order Hair Wax Up to 40% Off
description: Purchase hair wax online and enjoy up to a 40% discount. Prices start at Rs.199. This offer is available to both new and existing users. Hurry, as it is valid for a limited time.

title: Men's Flip Flop & Slippers Online at Min 70% Off
description: Men's Flip Flop & Slippers available online with up to 70% discount. Prices starting from Rs.60. Offer applicable to all new and existing users. Limited-time validity.
